author: Microsoft
description:
Teach For America is reimagining how it supports teachers, so they can focus less on juggling systems and more on the students who need them most. Across the US teachers use the TFA OneApp, built on Microsoft Azure, to replace thousands of documents and scattered logins with one secure, streamlined hub for resources, coaching, and classroom planning. With identity consolidated and guidance just a click away, including an AI–powered knowledge bot built in Azure AI Foundry, teachers gain back crucial mental and emotional energy. That time and headspace go straight back to the classroom, helping educators meet underrepresented students where they are and build the kind of joyful, affirming learning environments every child deserves.

Learn more: https://unlocked.microsoft.com/teach-for-america/

Subscribe to Microsoft on YouTube here: https://aka.ms/SubscribeToYouTube

title: OneApp. Endless Support for Teachers
